title: JavaScript Code Completion Exercises with GitHub Copilot

steps.description:
# JavaScript Find Maximum Value

Copilot techniques:
1. Add JSDoc comments with @param and @returns
2. Include example usage
3. Try different array methods
4. Use comments to guide optimization

# JavaScript Find Duplicates

Explore Copilot features:
1. Start with simple implementation
2. Add performance requirements in comments
3. Request alternative solutions
4. Compare Set vs Array methods

# JavaScript Group By Property

Leverage Copilot by:
1. Writing clear function description
2. Adding example input objects
3. Using step-by-step comments
4. Testing different implementations
